Returns must be returned in original packaging and condition as received. We do not accept returns on worn apparel or used items. Buyer is responsible for all shipping cost. If you order the wrong size, don’t like your item, or have simply changed your mind you are welcome to return any unworn or unused item at your expense. Please post a 5 STAR Feedback rating and we will do the same. We look forward to future transactions. We appreciate your business.
